column1: The Pit Room////Got lucky and went on a Saturday 6pm with no line! Fast cafeteria line set up
column2: and the staff is very welcoming and accommodating if it's your first time. Got the brisket sandwich and my husband the barbacoa tacos
column3: with sides of mac n cheese and charred okra. Everything was divine
column4: down to the pickled veggies. The bussers were also very efficient and nice. The indoor seating seems minimal- but there is plentiful seating outdoors.
